subject: Television
Baseball
lead_paragraph: ESPN's new eight-part miniseries, "The Bronx Is Burning," is based on the book about the 1977 Yankees, the Brooklyn riots and Son of Sam among other events from that year.
snippet: ESPN's new eight-part miniseries, "The Bronx Is Burning," is based on the book about the 1977 Yankees, the Brooklyn riots and Son of Sam among other events from that year.
